completeListOfAbilities.name: Summon Moonstone
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
Self: 6 turns special effect Moonstone; 6 turns MAX BRV Up I
Increases BRV based on INT BRV
Instant turn rate
Does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoningã€? support

Slightly raises party's MAX BRVã€? reduces party's BRV damage taken while special effect Moonstone active (does not stack with special effects of same name); BRV Attack becomes Sicã€? HP Attack becomes Shining Moonstone while Moonstone active
Moonstone canceled when afflicted with Break

Quests start with 6 turns special effect Moonstone active

completeListOfAbilities.name: Energy Drain
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
2-hit magic  PG attack +  PF attack
Tremendously restores own HP based on HP damage dealt
Recovery limit: 20% of own MAX HP
HP recovered in excess of MAX HP added to own BRV

Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
Moderately restores party's HP based on HP damage dealt
Recovery limit: 10% of individual MAX HP
